title: Peaked Gold 5, currently Silver 5 LF Duo Partner (Main ADC/Mid)

replies.body: Finished Gold 4 but reached Gold 2 in pre season. After placements got put in to Silver 2. Looking for people who are competitive but fun at the same time. Main Top but can happily fill. Feel free to add me

Hi

I'm part of a clan that that has a NA team but I am trying to get a OCE one up and running, if you are interested feel free to come on to TS and have a chat and we can go from there.
TS Server:
ts.dmg-inc.com
I was only S5 last season but happy to join if you'll let me

hahaha I was S2 as well after playing 10games I went 7W 3L and stuck in B2 {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}  but now I am S5 in 3 days  {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} 

if wana duo I can play mid top n sup, so waiting for your reply {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
